website_summaries.verdict: A cheaper option for customers wanting a traditional Chinese Mahjong set.
pros: Authentic Mahjong set for Chinese players
Tiles are made of durable melamine and are engraved
cons: Set does not work with Western playing rules
Customer service can be difficult to reach

customer_reviews.title: Such a great set!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to purchase a Mah Jong set for a while because my grandmother loves to play. I am by no means a Mah Jong expert, but I already love this set! The tiles are sturdy and very well made. I’ve included pictures that hopefully help show how big they are. The characters are etched into the tile, so no having to worry about the ink rubbing off. Like other reviews mentioned, the case isn’t super sturdy but I also don’t plan on going halfway across the country with this Mah Jong set anyways, so who cares? It’s perfect for storage purposes and for keeping all of the tiles organized. Can’t wait to start playing with this set!
customer_reviews.author: agalexander0629

customer_reviews.title: Lovely mahjong tile set, but not quite "Professional"
customer_reviews.text: Really a beautiful set, especially for the money. However, according to my sources, this is not a "Professional" set. The tiles are sized for an automatic mahjong table. The tiles in a professional set are a little bit bigger than this. Again, this is from my Cantonese mahjong addict friends, so the term "professional" is probably loosely interpreted. Having said that, any mahjong player will be delighted with the weight, texture and detail of these tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, high-quality, expert-level mah-jongg set!
customer_reviews.text: I had this set sent to my mom in Honolulu, who was an avid mah-jongg player for many years, but had not played for the last 30 years. She was thrilled. She said everything about it is of the highest quality. She loves the tiles - sturdy, good sized, beautifully crafted, figures easy to read. The case is also well constructed and will protect the tiles for a long time. One of the best online purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Larri

customer_reviews.title: It looks good, only thing is the words or signs are ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Friday evening, and got it Sunday morning. That's really fast! It looks good, only thing is the words or signs are too big and the strokes are too thick for my taste, I prefer them to look more elegant. But its OK, I am using it to play games only. The size of the tiles are not too small or too big. Considering the price, I think this is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Travel sized set - box isn't very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews are correct: tape up the edges of the holder it comes in. The second I pulled on the handle provided, it came out. So I just carry it around like a book. The set itself is great. The pieces are not standard mahjong sized, but doesn't diminish gameplay. The book provided has some weird pictures for the dragon set. I've never seen the dragon set of tiles look like that, so you might have to print out your own handy guide to keep with the tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I’m cutting stars on this because the pieces that come with it don’t match the book. You do get all the pieces but they come random. I don’t like the pieces we got because they have all Chinese symbols and no English markings or numbers. Makes it very hard to play with. Also these don’t come with solitaire rules. Not hard to find them on the internet, but you do want to have templates. While the set is nice and they are worth the money, I would not buy them again because they are simply not what I thought I was buying. I gifted these or I would return them.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Majong Set

I have one that’s like a giant mousepad and it works well. Buy with confidence. You won’t regret.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, affordable and portable set, but print out a cheat  sheet for the character pieces.

This is tough for beginners, or don't know Chinese #'s to build straights, etc. Definitely suggest printing a cheat sheet for the character pieces until you are more familiar. Other than that, this is a solid, and handsome portable set.

product_meta.title: Yellow Mountain Imports Professional Chinese Mahjong Game Set - Double Happiness (Green) - with 146 Medium Size Tiles, 3 Dice and a Wind Indicator - for Chinese Style Game Play
feature_bullets: Chinese Mahjong Set, "Double Happiness": This standard size Chinese mahjong set plays by Chinese gameplay only, not American/Western rules; No Joker tiles or Arabic numerals markings are included, just the pure and original characters and iconography used in traditional Chinese mahjong tile art

146 Scratch-Resistant Green Tiles: The melamine tiles with green bamboo grain stripes design include 36 circles, 36 bamboos, 36 characters, 12 dragons, 16 winds, 8 flowers and seasons, 2 blank spares; Tiles measure 1.3 x 1 x 0.7 inch (3.4 x 2.6 x 2 centimeters)

Comes With What You Need: With 3 dice and a wind indicator, this set is compact and easy to carry at 9.4 pounds (4.3 kilograms) for a very sturdy professional Chinese mahjong set; Racks and pushers are not included

Take Your Game Anywhere: With a compact, red vinyl case that fits the entire set, you can take your mahjong set with you, even on your travels; The case measures 12.6 x 10 x 2.1 inches (32.1 x 25.7 x 5.3 centimeters)
